patient_info: Proteinuria,Urticaria,Thrombocytopenia,Neutropenia,Pancytopenia,Leukopenia,Megaloblastic anemia,Reticulocytosis,Diarrhea,Vertigo,Hyperglycemia,Generalized muscle weakness,Increased total bilirubin,Decreased body weight,Unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia,Anisocytosis,Abnormal urinary color,Abnormal granulocytopoietic cell morphology,Macroscopic hematuria,Elevated circulating aspartate aminotransferase concentration,Hypercoagulability
golden_diagnosis: 阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria 2,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
predict_diagnosis:
1. Lupus nephritis - nephrotic syndrome
2. Vasculitis
3. Goodpasture's disease
4. Membranous nephropathy
5. Glomerulonephritis
6. Microangiopathic hemolytic uremic syndrome (Mahas)
7. Congenital aganglionic megacolon
8. Thrombotic microangiopathy
9. Essential thrombopenia
10. Hypercoagulable states such as protein-bound or unbound hypercoagulable states.
